sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_nnemc0_labor_categories"> <x_snc_nnemc0_labor_categories action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category_level display_value="Junior Level">fe320462db9d23008e9357935e96190f</category_level> <category_name>Packager</category_name> <education_level display_value="High school Diploma or General Equivalency Diploma (GED)">9972c462db9d23008e9357935e9619b1</education_level> <minimum_experience>Must have 2-4 years of experience packaging materials for shipment and storage. Under general supervision shall research publications, directives, and correspondence to identify hazardous material and perform partial disassembly of components for preservation and packaging, perspiration and fingerprint removal cleaning process, method cushioned item waterproof bag process, sealed preservation, and electrostatic discharge packaging. With limited supervision, perform packaging to include fabricating an interior shroud, installing cushioning, blocking, and bracing in the shipping container and installing seal barrier material. In preparation for shipment, the packager shall waterproof shipping containers, seal fiberboard shipping containers, strap fiberboard/wood shipping containers, weigh and cube shipping containers, mark shipping containers, and palletize shipping containers. Personnel who perform duties in some phase of transportation of hazardous materials shipment certification must attend a 2 week approved DOD Hazmat school and recertify every 3 years.</minimum_experience> <number>LABCAT0001126</number> <parent_category/> <sys_class_name>x_snc_nnemc0_labor_categories</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>jnyika</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-10-24 16:40:28</sys_created_on> <sys_id>fbc48426db9d23008e9357935e9619f1</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>jnyika</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-10-24 16:50:38</sys_updated_on> </x_snc_nnemc0_labor_categories> </record_update>
